divs: Sighting DetailsWell I was playing on my iPad outside on my porch and talking to mom when I looked up and saw a blue light I ask mom what is that she said I don't know we'll it keep getting closer to us so I got video out on my phone and stared video tapping it it was bright blue in the the north sky and then moved so fast to the south sky and it keepped disappearing on and off then it moved slow below to the tree line and then shot back up in the sky and disappeared right before my eyes I have a perfect video of this and it was not anything man made I a sure you
Summary: It was bright blue at first and looked like star at first then got brighter and the it turned solid red and then turned white and moved really fast and then really slow
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
